summary: AN ORDINANCE making further revisions to the 2000 annual budget and accounts by decreasing certain expenditure allowances and increasing certain other expenditure allowances in the 2000 budgets of various City departments and agencies from various City funds to provide for various costs and expenses not provided for in the 2000 Budget; appropriating, re-appropriating and transferring money from various City funds and subfunds, by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
